]]> false activate.life.cycle.migration false false false false triggered false event.parm1 false Please note that the asset: ${refresh_line.asset.display_name} assigned to ${refresh_line.asset.assigned_to} is scheduled to be reclaimed on ${refresh_line.scheduled_date}.

        <message_html><![CDATA[<p>Please note that the asset: ${refresh_line.asset.display_name} assigned to ${refresh_line.asset.assigned_to} is scheduled to be reclaimed on ${refresh_line.scheduled_date}.</p>
